name: Cancer
description: Cancer is a disease in which some of the body's cells grow uncontrollably and spread to other parts of the body. Cancer can start almost anywhere in the human body, which is made up of trillions of cells

name: Cardiology
description: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the circulatory system. The field includes medical diagnosis and treatment of congenital heart defects, coronary artery disease, heart failure, valvular heart disease and electrophysiology.

name: Neurology
description: Neurology is the branch of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of disorders of the nervous system. The nervous system is a complex, sophisticated system that regulates and coordinates body activities. ... Central nervous system: the brain and spinal cord.

name: Lab
description: With State-of-the-art facilities and the most Advanced Technologies, we strive to deliver High-quality Laboratory Diagnostic services.

name: Dental Care
description: We have a team of specialists in every field of Dentistry, Orthodontics, Periodontics, Prosthodontics, and Endodontics.

name: Orthopedic
description: Orthopaedic surgery or orthopaedics, is the branch of surgery concerned with conditions involving the musculoskeletal system.

name: Medicine
description: Medicines can treat diseases and improve your health. If you are like most people, you need to take medicine at some point in your life. You may need to take medicine every day, or you may only need to take medicine once in a while.

name: Surgery
description: Surgery is a medical or dental specialty that uses operative manual and instrumental techniques on a person to investigate or treat a pathological condition such as a disease or injury, to help improve bodily function, appearance, or to repair unwanted ruptured areas.
